chapter.title: Nessie Vision Statement
chapter.para: In this section we outline the philosophy and long range goals of Nessie. By doing so we put Nessie in context and sketch an overall vision for the project. The vision is intended to guide the project's development and be the source of its requirements.

listitem.para: Nessie's primary purpose is to support education in the area of compiler construction. It thus should support that purpose by providing good documentation, offer a relatively simple design, and illustrate good software engineering principles
